decision_reasoning: officer's decision was within reasonable outcomes based on available evidence
procedural_fairness: applicant had an opportunity to respond but failed to provide adequate evidence
evidence_assessment: discrepancies between the applicant's stated duties and those confirmed by his employer
result_of_case: Court dismissed the judicial review application, upholding the officer's decision
application_details: Applicant's permanent residency application under Canadian Experience Class was denied due to alleged lack of required skilled work experience
